          Prompts for a valid password by asking for the password using PasswordPrompter.readPassword(String, Object...), checking its length against the constraints, asking for the password to be confirmed, and checking to make sure the passwords match.

Subinterfaces of OutputDevice in net.nicholaswilliams.java.licensing.licensor.interfaces.text.abstraction
 interface TextInterfaceDevice
          Specifies an interface for interacting with text devices in order to abstract the details of interaction away from the application code.
